snippet.title: Champion Baseball [ARCADE] 15,460 ⚾
snippet.description:
Champion Baseball, one of the golden era's best baseball games by Sega, 1983. After playing so many baseball games over the years, this one doesn't age well at all. Horrible running controls and the computer seems very, very cheaty. No matter what your teams lead is, the comp. team always comes back. 



#ChampionBaseball #MAME #Arcade
